sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YE165030 ( DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , CONB_SEIL_NUM , CONB_CDDL , ATTR_YR , USE_AMT , PYR_DDC_AMT , DDC_TRGT_AMT , THC_YR_DDC_AMT_ND_XPS , THC_YR_DDC_AMT , THC_YR_NDUC_EXTN_AMT , THC_YR_NDUC_CRFW_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR , CTRB_TYCD ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #yrtxBlggYr# , #clutSeptCd# , #systemkey# , ( SELECT NVL(MAX(AA.CONB_SEIL_NUM)+1,1) FROM YE165030 AA WHERE AA.DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR = #yrtxBlggYr# AND AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD = #clutSeptCd# AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# ) , #conbCddl# , #attrYr# , #useAmt# , #pyrDdcAmt# , #ddcTrgtAmt# , #thcYrDdcAmtNdXps# , #thcYrDdcAmt# , #thcYrNducExtnAmt# , #thcYrNducCrfwAmt# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , ( SELECT MANGE_ITEM01 FROM BASS0300 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND COMM_CD = #conbCddl# AND RPSTTV_CD = 'B023' AND MANGE_ITEM02 = 'Y' ) )
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE YE165030 SET CONB_CDDL = #conbCddl# , ATTR_YR = #attrYr# , USE_AMT = #useAmt# , PYR_DDC_AMT = #pyrDdcAmt# , DDC_TRGT_AMT = #ddcTrgtAmt# , THC_YR_DDC_AMT_ND_XPS = #thcYrDdcAmtNdXps# , THC_YR_DDC_AMT = #thcYrDdcAmt# , THC_YR_NDUC_EXTN_AMT = #thcYrNducExtnAmt# , THC_YR_NDUC_CRFW_AMT = #thcYrNducCrfwAmt# , ISMT = #ismt# , REVN_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR = #revnAddr# , CTRB_TYCD = ( SELECT MANGE_ITEM01 FROM BASS0300 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND COMM_CD = #conbCddl# AND RPSTTV_CD = 'B023' AND MANGE_ITEM02 = 'Y' )
WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR = #yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD = #clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# AND CONB_SEIL_NUM = #conbSeilNum#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YE165030 WHERE DPOB_CD =#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR =#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD =#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY =#systemkey# AND CONB_SEIL_NUM =#conbSeilNum#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , CONB_SEIL_NUM , CONB_CDDL , CONB_CDDL AS conbCddlcommCd , fcBass0300CDNM(DPOB_CD, CONB_CDDL) AS conbCddlcommCdNm , ATTR_YR , USE_AMT , PYR_DDC_AMT , DDC_TRGT_AMT , THC_YR_DDC_AMT_ND_XPS , THC_YR_DDC_AMT , THC_YR_NDUC_EXTN_AMT , THC_YR_NDUC_CRFW_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR , CTRB_TYCD
FROM YE165030 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , CONB_CDDL , CONB_SEIL_NUM
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#
SELECT COUNT(SYSTEMKEY) totcnt FROM YE165030 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#

sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YE165030 ( DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , CONB_SEIL_NUM , CONB_CDDL , ATTR_YR , USE_AMT , PYR_DDC_AMT , DDC_TRGT_AMT , THC_YR_DDC_AMT_ND_XPS , THC_YR_DDC_AMT , THC_YR_NDUC_EXTN_AMT , THC_YR_NDUC_CRFW_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #yrtxBlggYr# , #clutSeptCd# , #systemkey# , #conbSeilNum# , #conbCddl# , #attrYr# , #useAmt# , #pyrDdcAmt# , #ddcTrgtAmt# , #thcYrDdcAmtNdXps# , #thcYrDdcAmt# , #thcYrNducExtnAmt# , #thcYrNducCrfwAmt# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# )

sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , CONB_SEIL_NUM , CONB_CDDL , ATTR_YR , USE_AMT , PYR_DDC_AMT , DDC_TRGT_AMT , THC_YR_DDC_AMT_ND_XPS , THC_YR_DDC_AMT , THC_YR_NDUC_EXTN_AMT , THC_YR_NDUC_CRFW_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE165030 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND CONB_SEIL_NUM=#conbSeilNum#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , CONB_SEIL_NUM , CONB_CDDL , ATTR_YR , USE_AMT , PYR_DDC_AMT , DDC_TRGT_AMT , THC_YR_DDC_AMT_ND_XPS , THC_YR_DDC_AMT , THC_YR_NDUC_EXTN_AMT , THC_YR_NDUC_CRFW_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE165030 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , CONB_SEIL_NUM DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
